page.title: 13IFTON HEATH C.P. SCHOOL
page.content:
{Ifton Heath School}lies at the northern end of the village.It is made of{red brick}under a{slate roof}with extensions added.There are{eight classrooms,a library,a canteen and a hall which is also used as a dining room.
I go to school at{9.00.a.m.}First the class write out their{spellings.}Next we do{maths}and then we do some {writing}about the Domesday project.On {Tuesday}we go{swimming}to Rhyn Park Comprehensive School.On{Wednesday,}we do{science,}sometimes we watch a{T.V. {programme}about{science.}In the after noon,we go into the hall for{P.E.}or {drama.}On{Thursday}we do{maths}and {topic.}On{Friday}we have a{spelling {test}and then in the afternoon we have {games.}It is my{favourite}day.
